import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { PlayBtn } from './form' export function PlaylistPreview({ playlist }) { return 30 && "..."}}`}>
{playlist.name.substring(0, playlist.name.indexOf("-" || ":")) || playlist.name}
{playlist.description}
{playlist.name.slice((playlist.name.indexOf('-' || ':') + 2), playlist.name.length + 1).slice(0, 30)}{playlist.name.length > 30 && "..."} {playlist.name.slice((playlist.name.indexOf('-' || ':') + 2), playlist.name.length + 1).slice(0, 15)}{playlist.name.length > 15 && "..."}
}
